name: Radio.Unfix
short_description: IPv6 Multicast Internet Radio Station backed by a MySQL database, PHP webbased frontend, a seperate mp3 gatherer/indexer and the pride of it all: Radio.Unfix which sends your mp3's onto the internet using only one stream for unlimited listeners.
